protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Inhibits neurotransmitter release by reducing calcium ion currents and increasing potassium ion conductance. Receptor for dynorphins. May play a role in arousal and regulation of autonomic and neuroendocrine functions

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
